page.title: 18E.T.Electrotech, Littleton
page.content: On the outskirts of Littleton at Whalewharf is to be found an electronics company .The company is involved in the design, development and manufacture of sophisticated high vacuum and plasma processing equipment for the semi-conductor and associated industries,throughout the world. The buildings will occupy a total site of 250,000 square feet when development of the site is fully complete. The company has other sites in the United Kingdom but it is intended that the Whalewharf site should house a large new headquarters and research and development facility. Much of the work of the company, particulary at the research stage, is highly confidential and secret and so it was not possiible to interview any employees.
